Question: This person died on September 26, 2008, aged 83, surrounded by his family and close friends.
Hints: This person was one of the few actors who successfully made the transition from 1950s cinema to that of the 1960s and 1970s.
This person's spokesman told the press that the star was "doing nicely," but neither confirmed nor denied that he had cancer.
In August, after reportedly finishing chemotherapy, this person told his family he wished to die at home.
